name: LittleNight
description:
Little Night

A small platform game, made for the Guildford Games Festival Game Jam 2021

Keep in mind that this game is not yet finished, from the little time we had for the Jam & personal life we only managed to make this little single level prototype.

Special attention to the statue in the game that mimics one of the Guildford statues :)  Can you guess which one ?

Hope you all like it.

--------------------------------------------

Controls:

Walk Keyboard: Left and Right arrows

Jump: Z or SpaceBar

Attack: X

Restart Level: R

--------------------------------------------

CREDITS 

Felipe Teles (Level Design) 

Philippe Canavarro (Programming) 

Rodrigo Boeri  (PixelArt & Music)
